Instance.description: Tuning used by CAS to group the preference-traits with associated likes and dislikes. Anytime a new Preference Item subclass is added, update Tuning Load methods in SimPreferences.cpp/h in order for Preference Items to be available for selection in CAS.

Tunable.name: cas_preference_category
Tunable.description: The category this Preference Item belongs to. (E.g. if the Preference Item contains: Trait-Likes-Pink and Trait-Dislikes-Pink, then the category would be Preference-Category-Color.

Tunable.name: dislike
Tunable.description: The dislike-trait for this Preference Item.

Tunable.name: like
Tunable.description: The like-trait for this Preference Item.

TunableVariant.name: tooltip
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the tooltip description text for this item in the CAS Preferences Panel.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.
